_comment: Optional overrides for the auto-generated entity registry. Only add entries here if the automated system gets something wrong.

_usage.credit_classes: Override credit class data by ID (e.g., 'C05': { 'name': 'Custom Name', 'aliases': ['Alias1'] })
_usage.projects: Override project data by ID (e.g., 'C02-003': { 'name': 'Custom Name' })
_usage.organizations: Override organization data by key (e.g., 'admin_123a7e9g': { 'name': 'Regen Network' })
